body_content.explanation: a group of travelling performers including acrobats (= people skilled in difficult physical movements) or those who work with trained animals, or a performance by such people usually in a large tent:
examples: She ran away to join the circus.
The horses trotted into the circus ring (= the large circle, with seats all around, in which a circus performs).
The children loved being taken to the circus.

body_content.explanation: a lot of activity and interest caused by an event or situation:
examples: the media circus surrounding the case

body_content.explanation: an open circular area where several roads join:
